name: Planeshot Arcade
description:
Controls:

For Touch Screen (Android)

  • Screen tap = (Left & Right side) 
  • Red Button = Fire
  • Red Joystick = Gas
  • Green Joystick = Steer

For Desktop (Windows)

  • Steer = Left & Right Arrow Keys
  • Gas  = Up & Down Arrow Keys
  • Fire = Enter or Spacebar
    • Optional (Screen Tap / Mouse Click on-screen buttons)
